name: Pick the Axe
description:
Pick the Axe 

  • A small smashing game that let's you find artifacts and puzzle pieces.
  • This is for Godot Game Jam #2 | Theme: Hidden Within
  • The game will start once you do a smash

Controls

  • Left Mouse Button - To Smash
  • Spacebar - To use random skill

Goal

  • To collect all puzzle pieces [G][O][D][O][T]

Made by: FatFat05
